title: Lebanese lentil soup
ingredients: ['1 (500g) container chicken stock', '1.4L (2 3/8 pints) water', '1 small onion, peeled and diced', '1 bay leaf', '3 sprigs flat leaf parsley', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '1L (1 3/4 pints) water', '275g (10 oz) dried brown lentils, rinsed and drained', '675g (1 1/2 lb) Swiss chard - rinsed, stems removed and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', 'good handful chopped fresh coriander', '100ml (4 fl oz) lemon juice', 'salt to taste', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
